title: Apple's Software Quality Crisis
dot: digraph AppleSoftwareCrisis{node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#f4f4f4", fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];subgraph cluster_1{label="The Issue";style=dashed;color=gray;node[fillcolor="#fdfdfd"];"Initial Problem"->"Lag and Overheating"->"Apple Notes and Freeform" "Lag and Overheating"->"Apple Pencil Pro" "Apple Pencil Pro"->"Palm rejection failure" "Apple Pencil Pro"->"Pressure Sensitivity"}subgraph cluster_2{label="Timeline";style=dotted;color=blue;node[fillcolor="#e7f2ff"];"Nov 6, 2024"->"Visit Apple Store (Turin)" "Nov 13, 2024"->"Hardware Replacement" "Feb 27, 2025"->"Identical Performance Issues"}subgraph cluster_3{label="Systemic Problem";style=dashed;color=gray;node[fillcolor="#f4f4f4"];"Thermal Management Failures"->"M2 Chip" "Memory Management Failures"->"Degradation and Memory Leaks"}subgraph cluster_4{label="Key Issues Identified";style=dotted;color=red;node[fillcolor="#ffe6e6"];"Lag in Notes and Freeform" "Device Overheating" "Apple Pencil Responsiveness"}subgraph cluster_5{label="Call to Action";style=dotted;color=green;node[fillcolor="#d7f9d7"];"Focus on Optimization"->"Performance and Stability" "Transparency"->"Acknowledgment of Issues" "Extended Support"->"Extended Warranties" "Prioritize User Experience"->"Fix Existing Problems"}"The Issue"->"Timeline"[label="Context"];"Systemic Problem"->"Key Issues Identified"[label="Details"];"Key Issues Identified"->"Call to Action"[label="Resolution"];}

title: James Harrison, whose blood donations saved >2M babies, has died
dot: digraph JamesHarrison{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue];MainConcept[label="James Harrison: The Man with the Golden Arm\nAustralia's Most Prolific Blood Donor", shape=ellipse, fillcolor=lightyellow];Contributions[label="Contributions", shape=box];SavingLives[label="Saved 2.4 Million Babies", shape=box];PlasmaDonor[label="Donated Plasma 1,173 Times", shape=box];AntiDAntibody[label="Rare Anti-D Antibody", shape=box];FamilyImpact[label="Enabled Family Growth", shape=box]; Background[label="Background", shape=box];HealthIssues[label="Underwent Major Surgery at 14", shape=box];Motivation[label="Motivated by Generosity of Donors", shape=box]; Legacy[label="Legacy", shape=box];ContinuedResearch[label="Research for Synthetic Anti-D", shape=box];FamilyDonors[label="Inspired Family to Donate Blood", shape=box];MainConcept->Contributions;Contributions->SavingLives;Contributions->PlasmaDonor;Contributions->AntiDAntibody;Contributions->FamilyImpact;MainConcept->Background;Background->HealthIssues;Background->Motivation;MainConcept->Legacy;Legacy->ContinuedResearch;Legacy->FamilyDonors;Notes[label="Died at Age 88\nLast Donation in 2018", shape=box, fillcolor=lightgray];MainConcept->Notes;}
